name: Sakura
description: Sakura is a flavor from a flower with the same name in Japan, offering a floral and mildly sweet taste.

name: Taro
description: Taro has a creamy and nutty flavor with a hint of vanilla, made from taro root.

name: Lychee
description: Lychee has a delicate and fragrant sweetness with a hint of floral notes, reminiscent of tropical fruit.

name: Yuzu
description: Yuzu has a unique citrus flavor with a blend of tartness and sweetness, reminiscent of a cross between grapefruit and mandarin orange.

name: Strawberry
description: Strawberry provides a sweet and slightly tart flavor, reminiscent of fresh strawberries.
